thread.title: BRIEF-IDT says Chairman Jonas To Buy 2.5 Mln Shares of Class B Stock

title: BRIEF-IDT says Chairman Jonas To Buy 2.5 Mln Shares of Class B Stock
text:
April 17, 2018 / 3:52 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-IDT says Chairman Jonas To Buy 2.5 Mln Shares of Class B Stock Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 17 (Reuters) - IDT Corp: 
* IDT CORP - HOWARD JONAS HAS AGREED TO PURCHASE 2.5 MILLION SHARES OF CLASS B COMMON STOCK AT A PRICE PER SHARE OF $5.89 
* IDT CORP SAYS JONAS WILL PAY $1.5 MILLION OF PURCHASE PRICE WITHIN 10 DAYS OF EXECUTION OF DEFINITIVE AGREEMENT - SEC FILING 
* IDT CORP SAYS HAS AGREED TO PRESENT SHARES SALE MATTER TO ITS STOCKHOLDERS AT NEXT STOCKHOLDERS MEETING 
* IDT CORP SAYS REMAINDER OF PURCHASE PRICE WILL BE PAYABLE BY JONAS POST STOCKHOLDERS APPROVAL & SHARES WILL BE ISSUED UPON PAYMENT OF IN FULL 
* IDT CORP - BOARD APPROVED ARRANGEMENT WITH CHAIRMAN JONAS RELATED TO PURCHASE OF SHARES OF CLASS B COMMON STOCK BY HIM Source text : ( bit.ly/2H6H3pD ) Further company coverage:
